gw.api.datagen

Class DatagenUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.datagen.DatagenUtil

  • public class DatagenUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    DatagenUtil provides randomization methods and other helpers to support datagen.
    Author:
    kshiue

    • Method Detail

      • setRandomSeed

        public static void setRandomSeed(long seed)

        Set the starting seed value for new random number generators. The seed will be incremented for random number generators in new threads.

        Warning! If running with multiple app servers, and each app server has is set to the same seed, each one will be running through identical pseudo-random sequences.

        Parameters:
        seed - the seed value

      • getRandomFromDistribution

        public static java.lang.Object getRandomFromDistribution(java.util.Map<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Integer> distribution)
        Gets an object from a distribution map, where the key is the object, and the value is the relative number of times it should appear. As an example: A -> 5 B -> 1 This means that 5/6 times A should be returned, and 1/6 times B should be, on average.

        The implementation: a random number from 0 to strictly less than the max (sum of all of the values) is selected at random. Then, traversing through the array, a running total is created of each of the numbers associated with the objects. At the point where the running total is greater than the random number selected, then the object is returned.

        Thus, with the data shown above, if the ordering of the map ends up being A, then B, and the random number selected is 4, then A is selected (5 > 4). If the random number were 5, then B would be selected again !(5 > 5).

        5 1 A B

        Parameters:
        distribution - The distribution map.
        Returns:
        the object selected from the map.

      • normaliseDistribution

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Integer> normaliseDistribution(int totalNumber,
                                                                      java.util.Map<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Integer> distribution)
        Takes the map of objects to choose from, and the total number of choices, and makes a selection that's normalised on that total number.
        Parameters:
        totalNumber - the number of choices
        distribution - map of objects
        Returns:
        a new map distribution renormalized on totalNumber from distribution

      • doStaticGosuCall

        public static java.lang.Object doStaticGosuCall(java.lang.String clazz,
                                java.lang.String methodName,
                                java.lang.Object[] params)
                                         throws java.lang.NoSuchMethodException
        Does a call on a Gosu static class method with the supplied parameters. Is fragile. Please take care in using it.
        Parameters:
        clazz - The string representation of the class (gw.api.Blah)
        methodName - The method name.
        params - the parameters as java objects
        Returns:
        whatever the gosu call would return as a java object.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NoSuchMethodException - if the named method does not exist
